item.title: Multipart-POST Request Using Google Apps Script
item.description: Gist These sample scripts are for requesting multipart post using Google Apps Script. In most cases, the multipart request is used for uploading files. So I prepared 2 sample situations as follows. For each situation, the request parameters are different. Upload a file from Google Drive to Slack. Convert an excel file to Spreadsheet on Google Drive using Drive API v3. Multipart post is required for these situations.
